title: Algonquin Times Mobile App
description: A native iOS app that displays the current weather for a saved location, utilizing Apple's WeatherKit.
features: User can save a location to view the current weather.
User can view the current weather for the saved location.

title: Weatherly
description: A native iOS app that displays the current weather for a saved location, utilizing Apple's WeatherKit.
features: User can save a location to view the current weather.
User can view the current weather for the saved location.

title: Weather App
description: A React web app that displays the current weather for a saved location, utilizing the OpenWeatherMap API.
features: User can save a location to view the current weather.
User can view the current weather for the saved location.

title: Movie Finder
description: A progressive web app that allows users to search for movies and view details, utilizing the TMDb API.
features: User can search for movies by title.
User can view details of a movie.

title: Face Detection
description: An image search with face detection utilizing the MediaPipe model.
features: User can search for an image using a key word.
User can save image to cache.
Saved images can be scanned with face detection.

title: Adventure Co-operative
description: A two-page mobile responsive website for a fictional cooperative board game app.
features: Responsive design for mobile and desktop.
